text: Remember Juicy Couture tracksuits and how you wanted a set in every color, but your mom wouldn't buy one for you because she was ` ` not gon na spend $ 200 on a sweatsuit''? Yeah, me too. Those tracksuits were so fetch during most of the 2000s, but like all trends, people eventually moved on to other, less match - y things. By 2014, the original Juicy Couture owners had peaced out and Juicy closed all of the U. S. boutiques, which would explain why you haven't seen Kim K wearing a set in recent years.
